鏠字的基本解释

鏠
fēng
古同“锋”。

鏠字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》敷容切，平鍾，敷。］
“锋1”的繁体字。亦作“鏠1”。亦作“1”。
(1)刀、剑等有刃的兵器的尖端或锐利部分。
(2)借指刀、剑等有刃的兵器。
(3)指器物的尖端。
(4)尖锐；锐利。参见“鋒石”、“鋒戈”。
(5)军队的前列。
(6)锋芒、势头。
(7)古农具名。
(8)指以锋翻地。
(9)气象名词。参见“鋒面”、“鋒綫”。
(10)通“蜂”。参见“鋒至”。
(11)通“蜂”。成群地。参见“鋒起”。
(12)通“豐”。参见“鋒殺”。
(13)用同“烽”。参见“鋒火”。

鏠字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鏠； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1320第09
【唐韻】【集韻】?敷容切，音峰。【說文】兵耑也。【史記·東方朔傳】變詐鏠出，莫能窮者。　又旗名。【前漢·郊祀志】爲泰乙鏠旗，命曰靈旗，爲兵禱，則太史奉以指所伐國。　【說文】或作鋒。

鏠字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
鏠字的起名意思

暂无。

鏠
Basic explanation of words
鏠
fēng
Gu Tong "Feng".
鏠
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" apply Rongqi, Pingzhong, apply. ]
Traditional characters of "锋1". Also known as "鏠1". Also known as "1".
(1) The tip or sharp part of bladed weapons such as knives and swords.
(2) By means of bladed weapons such as knives and swords.
(3) Refers to the tip of the utensil.
(4) Sharp; sharp. See "Feng Shi", "Feng Ge".
(5) The forefront of the army.
(6) Sharpness and momentum.
(7) Ancient farm tool names.
(8) Refers to turning the ground with a front.
(9) Meteorological terms. See "front", "front".
(10) Through "bee". See "Feng Zhi".
(11) Through "bee". In groups. See "Feng Qi".
(12) Through "Feng". See "Fight Kill".
(13) Use the same as "Feng". See "Fenghuo".
鏠
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Su Ji 1】【Golden Word Department】　鏠; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1320 Page 09
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Apply Rong Qi, sound peak. [Said the text] Soldiers also. 【Historical Records·Dongfang Shuo Chuan】Changing deceit, there is no way for the poor.　Also the name of the flag. [Pre-Han · Jiao Si Zhi] It is the Taiyi flag, the order is called the spirit flag, and the soldier prays, then Taishi Feng refers to the country that was conquered.　【Said Wen】Or as a front.
鏠
